Title: Two Piece Evening Dress

Description: A two piece gown with a  color blocked skirt that is form fitting and flares slightly at the bottom. The bodice is sheer with an applique of beading and sequins. The shoulders and neckline are both trimmed with satin. The dress is perfect for a fun and flirty night.
